title: We Gettin' The Last of Us 2 Date Next Week? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.18.19
description:
Imran and Greg debate what next week's PlayStation State of Play means!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:25 - Housekeeping
Party Mode is up: Borderlands 3 Proving Grounds w/Andy and Me youtube.com/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:03:10 - PlayStation State of Play Announced for Tuesday
00:05:23 - “Which state of play are we going to get?” - Parker Petrov
00:16:59 - Link’s Awakening Reviews
00:20:26 - “Do you think this game should be sold at a full $60 price?” - Tzurki
00:25:02 - “Do you think there is a point where you can love a game or a franchise so much that you can no longer be objective about it?” - Bliss
00:32:30 - NBCUniversal Leaves Game Publishing
00:35:04 - PlayStation’s 10-year vision for Dreams
00:36:10 - “I know that Dreams is still in early access…” - The Five Star Man
00:44:37 - Next Gen Dev Won’t Cost More
00:48:24 - Out today
00:56:42 -  kindafunny.com/paxtournament
Reader mail   -
00:57:14 - “White Phosphorus in Modern Warfare” - Alan
01:05:02 - “A zombie was found in Red Dead 2 Online…” - The Nano Biologist
01:07:36 - Squad Up: John Paul - Twitter - @jpkilcrease
01:09:32 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Fran
